title: Pet Friendly, Newly Renovated, Swimming Pool *ONE MONTH FREE AVA AUG*
posting_body: Avery Park Apartments in Englewood, CO 80111 is a beautiful community located 25 minutes from downtown Denver and less than 5 minutes from I-25.

Our lovely apartment homes come equipped with washers and dryers, private patios or balconies, kitchens with pantries, wood burning fireplaces, large closet space and wood style floors in select homes.
Avery Park is a pet friendly community featuring a 24 hour fitness center, swimming pool, playground, barbecue picnic area, on-site recycling and complimentary coffee.
We are located near the Denver Tech Center, less than 10 minutes from Park Meadows Mall and less than five miles from C-470 and I-225.
Avery Park promotes healthy living by offering a smoke free environment.
Located in the Cherry Creek School District
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
